steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e1p79","text":"Following cDNA amplification in 10X workflow, bead purify as directed in instructions and set aside 10ul of cDNA to use in the following reaction. This should leave you with   of bead purified cDNA to complete the rest of the standard 10X whole transcriptome library with. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":174,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1p74k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jhbj","text":"Primers: Reverse primer (P5-Read1) plus a forward primer (P7-i7 index-Read2-Upstream_Barcode sequence).
